Title: Grease Live!
Writer: Bronte Woodard (screenplay by), Allan Carr (adaptation), Robert Cary (adapted for television by), Jonathan Tolins (adapted for television by), Jim Jacobs (based on the original musical by), Warren Casey (based on the original musical by)
Actors: Julianne Hough, Aaron Tveit, Vanessa Hudgens, Keke Palmer
Plot: After enjoying a summer romance, high school students Danny and Sandy are unexpectedly reunited when she transfers to Rydell High. There Sandy must contend with cynical Rizzo and the Pink Ladies in attempt to win Danny's heart again.
Awards: Won 5 Primetime Emmys. Another 2 wins & 10 nominations.
